name: Olive Oil Castile Soap
description: This is the base soap that all my creations start with. Pure and simple! It is a moisturizing, vegan, Castile soap. This can be used for bathing, shampooing, laundry, and dishes!

name: Lime & Black Pepper Soap
description:
This is an odd combination that really works and is refreshing! It is made using both lime and black pepper essential oils, dried dill for a light green tint of color, and fresh cracked pepper.

	All my soaps are vegan and contain no artificial colors or fragrance. They are olive oil and coconut oil based.

name: Pink Grapefruit Soap
description:
Made with pink grapefruit and sweet orange essential oils. This bar also contains cornmeal as a gentile exfoliant. Grapefruit is said to be good for oily skin and is a natural toner. Ground paprika gives this bar its soft pink color.

	All Candy Bar Soaps contain no artificial colors or fragrance. They are olive oil and coconut oil based.

name: Green Tea & Ylang-Ylang Soap
description:
Made with crushed green tea leaves and Ylang-ylang essential oil. Green tea is a natural antiseptic and Ylang-ylang is believed to normalize sebum secretion for skin problems, and is considered to be an aphrodisiac. The warm caramel color is from the tea leaves and dried dill.

	All Candy Bars Soaps are vegan and contain no artificial colors or fragrance. They are olive oil and coconut oil based.
